name: One step forward, one step back.
description: A walking score of 700 steps due east, 870 frames. Collaboration with composer Linda Bouchard.|| video loop and sound, 27s, 2160x2160 pixels, 2021. || Part of the MAY2021 series by Ian Winters, a daily video meditation for NFT during May 2021. || IG: ianwinters.video.artist | IG:lindabouchardcomposer || hen.link/ianwinters || @info_iw } @libouco ||
